Description:
Improvement Notice:

Health & Safety at Work etc. Act 1974, Section 2(1) 
Regulation 4(1)(b)(ii) of the Manual Handling Operations Regulations 1992

you have failed to ensure, where it is not reasonably practicable to avoid the need for your employees to undertake the batch assembly of raw materials for the blending floor, which is a manual handling operation which involves a risk of employees being injured, to take steps to reduce the risk of injury to the lowest level reasonably practicable.
